amendment.description: Amendment to the Young (AK) substitute amendment (A001) sought to specify that the authority granted in the bill to allow the exporting of Alaskan oil shall be terminated if for any reason American vessels cannot be used to transport the oil to be exported.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to the Young (AK) amendment to specify that the authority granted in the bill to allow the exporting of Alaskan oil shall be terminated if for any reason American vessels cannot be used to transport any of the oil to be exported.

action.text: Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Gejdenson to the Young (AK) amendment (A001).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gejdenson amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 117 - 278, 1 Present (Roll no. 555).
